snippet: Mr. Rosen’s National Book Award-winning volume “The Classical Style” illuminated the enduring language of Haydn, Mozart and Beethoven.
abstract: Charles Rosen, pianist, scholar and author, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rosen’s National Book Award-winning volume “The Classical Style” illuminated the enduring language of Haydn, Mozart and Beethoven.

headline.seo: Charles Rosen, Pianist, Polymath and Author, Dies at 85
headline.main: Charles Rosen, Scholar-Musician Who Untangled Classical Works, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Charles Rosen, 85, Scholar-Musician Who Untangled Classical Works, Dies
